projects.title: TBA - Visualization for Reinsurance Survey Points - Automated Underwriting
projects.description: Peak Exposure的位置，选取top10的仓库和楼宇，转换地址为谷歌地图经纬度，合并需要查勘的位点和经纬度并转为XML，在google-earth中显示

projects.title: TBA - Data for ESG - Extent and melting of the Arctic Ice Cap
projects.description: 描绘北极冰盖的边缘，自动抠图并裁剪，强调边缘，对历年数据进行叠加组成动态图，同时展示历年CO2排放总量-以展示它们的关系

projects.title: Text Mining for Automated Contract
projects.description: Crawl the external data source of the relevant insurance industry wording research organizations (IUA and LMA)
